name: Ivey Meeting Notes
description: Captures all meeting activity with per-speaker action items, decisions and blockers. Designed for Teams meetings with diarized transcripts.

sections.title: Summary
sections.instruction: Write a concise 2-3 sentence executive summary of the meeting. Include the meeting purpose, main outcome, and any critical decisions. Reference speaker names where known.

sections.title: Attendees
sections.instruction: List every speaker identified in the transcript. If speaker labels are SPEAKER_00, SPEAKER_01 etc., list them as-is and note their contributions. If real names appear in the transcript, use those.
sections.item_format: - **[Name or SPEAKER_XX]**: [brief description of their role/contribution in the meeting]

sections.title: Key Decisions
sections.instruction: List every decision that was made or agreed upon during the meeting. Attribute each decision to the speaker who proposed or confirmed it.
sections.item_format: - **[Decision]** — proposed by [Speaker] at [approx timestamp if available]

sections.title: Action Items
sections.instruction: Extract EVERY task, commitment or follow-up mentioned in the transcript. Attribute each item to the speaker who committed to it. Include the exact words used if possible. Leave Due blank if no date was mentioned.

sections.title: Blockers & Risks
sections.instruction: List every blocker, risk, dependency or concern that was raised. Note who raised it and any proposed mitigations.
sections.item_format: - **[Blocker/Risk]** — raised by [Speaker]: [details and proposed mitigation if any]

sections.title: Discussion Highlights
sections.instruction: Summarize the main topics discussed in order, capturing key points and outcomes per topic. Include speaker names where relevant.

sections.title: Next Steps
sections.instruction: List the agreed next steps and follow-up meetings or reviews. Include owners and timelines where specified.
